name: Dwarfen Mountain Holds Battalion
description:
Mighty armies mustered from the Dwarfen Mountain Holds
 can both blast the foe at range, and crush them up close.

name: Dwarf Ironbreakers
description:
Ironbreakers guard the deepest Dwarfen tunnels 
 from those who would otherwise invade their holds and domains.

name: Dwarf Warriors
description:
Dwarf Warriors are formidable fighters – strong and extremely resilient,
 broad of shoulder, with powerful arms and a low centre of gravity.

name: Lothern Sea Guard
description:
The Lothern Sea Guard crew warships 
 and act as the vanguard for the oncoming Ulthuan host.

name: Ellyrian Reavers
description:
Ellyrian Reavers are the descendants of generations of 
 expert cavalry from Ellyrion – a land renowned for the quality of the horses
 it breeds and skilled riders it produces.

name: Flamespyre Phoenix
description:
Flamespyre Phoenixes dwell amongst the great alabaster pillars of rock 
 that stand sentinel above the Shrine of Asuryan, 
 around which the Winds of Magic blow a constant gale.

name: Orc Boar Chariots
description:
By lashing together roughly-hewn planks and bolting round(ish) wheels to a sturdy axle,
 Orcs can build formidable chariots drawn by pairs of boars.

name: Troll Hag
description: Troll Hags are loathsome creatures, far larger and more dangerous than their kin.

name: Goblin Wolf Rider Mob
description:
Many Goblin tribes are nomadic in nature,
 traversing the wilderness in huge, ramshackle caravans.

name: Chaos Warriors
description: The Chaos Warriors who torment the Old World are no longer truly human.

name: Dragon Ogre Shaggoth
description:
Dragon Ogre Shaggoths are the oldest of their kind,
 ancient enough to have bargained with the Ruinous Powers themselves.

name: Sorcerer of Chaos
description:
Chaos Sorcerers wield the wild energies of Chaos itself,
 reshaping reality to serve the whims of their dark masters.

name: Knights of the Realm
description:
Knights of the Realm make up the bulk of Bretonnia’s nobility and its armed might,
 and command great respect for both their high station and the deeds they performed to attain it.

name: Lady Elisse Duchaard
description: Lady Elisse Duchaard is the Prophetess of the Duke of Brionne and a herald of the Lady of the Lake’s will.

name: Pegasus Knights
description:
Pegasus Knights are made up almost exclusively of Knights of the Realm,
 but only the wealthiest and most influential knights can boast of owning a battle-trained pegasus,
 for the creatures are difficult to capture and harder still to train.

name: Hills
description: Hills offer a tactical advantage for artillery, archers, and any commander seeking a vantage point.

name: Arcane Ruins
description: Arcane Ruins are littered across the Old World – forgotten relics of bygone eras.

name: Watchtower
description:
Watchtowers are erected along roads and rivers,
 on the borders between provinces, and on the outskirts of towns and forests.

name: Tomb King on Bone Dragon
description:
Tomb Kings are the ancient, long-dead rulers of Nehekhara,
 reborn through the archaic rituals of their Liche Priests.

name: Necrosphinx
description:
Necrosphinxes are terrifying war-constructs,
 patterned after the various mythical beasts that inhabit the Nehekharan underworld.

name: Arcane Journal: High Elf Realms
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of High Elves.

name: Arcane Journal: Warriors of Chaos
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Warriors of Chaos.

name: Arcane Journal: Dwarfen Mountain Holds
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Dwarfen Mountain Holds.

name: Arcane Journal: Orc & Goblin Tribes
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Orc & Goblin Tribes.

name: Arcane Journal: Empire of Man
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Empire of Man.

name: Arcane Journal: Kingdom of Bretonnia
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Kingdom of Bretonnia.

name: Arcane Journal: Tomb Kings of Khemri
description: This essential guidebook studies the rich history and background of the various cultures of Tomb Kings of Khemri.

name: Forces of Fantasy
description: Forces of Fantasy is your indispensable guide to the armies of order and civilisation.

name: Ravening Hordes
description: Ravening Hordes is your indispensable guide to the forces of evil in the World of Legend.

name: Warhammer: The Old World Rulebook
description: It is a dark age. An age where mighty armies from powerful nations clash to carve out empires on the field of battle.

name: Skaventide
description: A vicious, skittering Warhammer novel written by Gary Kloster.

name: Callis & Toll
description: Hanniver Toll and Armand Callis plunge into Cinderfall’s dirty underbelly to solve a ritual murder.

name: The Hollow King
description: A haunted, noble vampire seeks revenge on the cult that destroyed his kingdom.

name: Gotrek and Maleneth
description: Gotrek Gurnisson slays his way across the mortal realms.

name: Temple of Silence
description: Join Galen and Doralia ven Denst in a world of conspiracy, intrigue, and unknowable terrors.

name: The Last Volari
description:
Doomed vampire, Nyssa Volari, faces down the nature of her curse,
 and the righteous fury of the faithful of Sigmar.

name: Godeater's Son
description: A virtuous man succumbs to the path of darkness, and wages a war against Sigmar.

name: Bad Loon Rising
description: Blessed by the Bad Moon, can Zograt become the greatest Loonboss?.

name: Grombrindal: Ancestor's Burden
description: Discover the heroic deeds of a legendary Duardin warrior.

name: On the Shoulders of Giants and Other Stories
description: Includes a novella, and 11 short stories following Sigmar's mortal followers.

name: Spray: Wraithbone
description: Wraithbone Spray is designed for basecoating plastic and provides the perfect basecoat for Contrast paints.

name: Spray: Chaos Black
description: Chaos Black Spray is designed for basecoating plastic and provides the perfect basecoat for Contrast paints.

name: Leadbelcher
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Retributor Armour
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Mephiston Red
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Macragge Blue
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Mournfang Brown
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Celestra Grey
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Caledor Sky
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Incubi Darkness
description: Citadel Base paints are high quality acrylic paints specially formulated for basecoating quickly and easily.

name: Scenery Brush
description: This large, flat brush is for quickly covering huge areas of terrain.

name: Artificer Layer Brush
description: Made from the highest-quality sable hair, are the best layering brushes.

name: Shade Brush
description: Add shadows and detail to your models easily.

name: Cutters
description: Cutters designed to remove plastic components from the frame.

name: Painting Handle
description: Painting Handle – making it easy to paint your model.

name: Verdia Veldt Tufts
description: Includes 125 tufts that can be cut and shaped as needed.

name: Mordian Corpsegrass Tufts
description: Includes 125 dry and arid-looking grass tufts.

name: Desert Soil
description: Natural soil with small gravel.

name: Paper Plants
description: array of realistic laser-cut paper cutout plants for making forestor jungle.

name: Tufts - Grass Flock
description: High quality Nylon-type Flock with 2mm long fibers.
